name: CLIENT FLOW 360 CRM - Supabase Environment Configuration
description: Environment variables needed for Supabase integration

SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.description: Supabase anon public key from dashboard Settings > API
SUPABASE_ANON_KEY.instructions: Get this from https://supabase.com/dashboard → project kgezacvwtcetwdlxetji → Settings → API → anon public

deployment_steps: 1. Go to Vercel dashboard for your project
